column4: firestarter seems cool, but it doesn't run at boot.  Hmmm....
I had to start it as a user in order for it to come up.
firestarter is just the admin front end
:/ any ideas what I'm doing wrong?
you only need the front end to adjust it or observe
I wonder if it is because the interfaces weren't set as active
had me fooled for a while when I first used it too :)
it's just a front end for iptables - it *will* run on boot: you just don't see the GUI
